description: Lists cases for a given contact.

parameters.name: contactArn
parameters.description: A unique identifier of a contact in Amazon Connect.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

nested_items.name: cases
nested_items.description: A list of Case summary information.

nested_items.name: caseId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of the case.

nested_items.name: templateId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of a template.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. This is null if there are no more results to return.
